name: Whatting
tagline: The iPad diary, just for you
description: Still using PDF templates in Goodnotes? It's time to stop wandering from one PDF to another—come to Whatting! With Whatting, you can create your own custom diary layout by combining widgets just the way you like. Start for free today!

name: Scrimba Fullstack
tagline: Helping devs learn by merging the IDE and video into one
description: Scrimba Fullstack blends video tutorials with live coding, making it feel like you're pair programming with the teacher. Watch the teacher code, jump into the IDE to practice instantly, and get AI feedback to sharpen your fullstack skills, all in your browser.

name: Nily AI
tagline: Your AI crew for all things marketing
description: Nily is an all-in-one AI assistant for marketers, with 20+ AI models, LLM response comparison and mixture AI for delivering the most optimal answer. Nily supports AI design tools, sidebar, content creation, email assistant, and dynamic social media features!

name: SpreadSimple 2.0
tagline: The fastest way to build a website without code
description: Now with AI-powered website creation, more templates for any business, and advanced e-commerce tools. Build in minutes, update from Google Sheets, and stay in control—no code needed.

name: Appsmith Agents
tagline: Scale with secure, embedded agents all powered by your data
description: AI agents that work where you work! Running as a Chrome extension, agents unlock productivity for your teams within the tools they use daily. - Embed AI agents anywhere you work - Access real-time company knowledge - Enable human-in-the-loop workflows

name: PRISM by Block Convey
tagline: Monitor models, explain decisions, & future-proof models.
description: Built for AI startups and developers who move fast — PRISM is your open, plug-and-play layer for model audits, bias checks, and explainability reports. Ship models you can trust — with compliance, fairness, and transparency baked in from day one.

name: Educato for Students
tagline: AI tutor prep for 10.000+ university exams
description: Ace your exams with Educato! Our AI-driven platform offers personalized learning and top-notch exam prep resources. Join now and unlock your full potential!

name: Cloudflare Agents
tagline: The platform for building stateful AI
description: Cloudflare Agents is the platform for building scalable, stateful AI agents. Leverages Durable Objects for state, Workers for compute, plus real-time comms.

name: Brick 1100
tagline: Transform your smartphone into a classic brick phone
description: Do you miss your old Nokia cellphone? Miss the pixelated screen, the retro sounds, the simple yet addictive features? Brick 1100 is for you, a fun throwback that fits right in your pocket.

name: Klik Email
tagline: Turn designs into clickable email signatures instantly
description: Transform your designs into interactive, pixel-perfect HTML email signatures in minutes. No coding or templates required. Just upload your design, add clickable hotspots, and paste into your email. Download HTML files anytime with unlimited revisions.

name: Augment Agent
tagline: AI pair programmer that understands your codebase
description: Augment Agent is the AI pair programmer that deeply understands your codebase. Uses Memory, Tools (MCP & Native), 200K context. #1 SWE-bench approach open-sourced. Available for VS Code and JetBrains.

name: Apple Dev Docs Translation & Enhancer
tagline: Apple dev docs translation & enhancer
description: This extension for Apple dev docs, It's: 1. Instant translation 2. bilingual display mode 3. link previews just by hovering over them 4. customize the font size, and color of the bilingual content display. More features are in the works, stay tuned

name: Blobfish AI
tagline: AI Dialer that Talks, Qualifies Leads, and Books Meetings
description: Blobfish is a human-like AI Dialer that engages in back-and-forth conversations with your prospects. It can call thousands of numbers in minutes, filter out bad numbers or voicemails, and ask lead qualifying questions - 10x your junior SDR’s outbound work.

name: FRISPEECH
tagline: Comment and rate every webpage on the internet
description: FRISPEECH lets you comment on any website — even if comments are turned off. An anonymous, censorship-free browser extension & web app. No tracking, no algorithms. Swiss made. One login. Every voice matters.

name: Endel for ADHD 2.0
tagline: Sonic support tuned for ADHD brains
description: Explore a complete collection of trusted tools for versatile attention needs—all in one app 🧡 Co-created with the ADHD community

name: DexToro
tagline: The easiest way to discover, buy, and sell memecoins
description: The all-in-one DeFi super-app for the masses. Meet DexToro. The easiest way to discover, buy, and sell vetted memecoins & altcoins on Solana with one swipe, gas-free, and Apple Pay enabled. At DexToro, our mission is to onboard the masses to DeFi.

name: Recallify
tagline: AI powered memory & learning companion app
description: Recallify is your AI-powered memory & learning companion, helping you capture, recall, and enhance memories with cutting-edge AI. Seamlessly record text, audio, and video, and transform them into learning experiences while practising and improving recall.

name: Mezzoic - Alpha Launch
tagline: Software Project Estimation & Budget Tracking Solution
description: MEZZOIC is Software Project Estimation and Budget Tracking Solution. It is AI driven tool designed to provide quick estimation of the software project in resources and budgets, track the budget evolution, align stakeholders of different seniority level.

name: launch.css
tagline: Launch Your Ideas Faster
description: A classless CSS framework built for speed. Style your website later—build it now.

name: Zapfolio
tagline: Paste Your LinkedIn. Get a Portfolio Website. That’s It.
description: Paste your LinkedIn. Get a clean portfolio website in seconds. No code, no setup, just your profile turned into a personal site you can proudly share. Perfect for students, freelancers, job seekers, and creators.

tagline: The iPad diary, just for you
